name: Mitigation Playbook for Arbitrary Command Execution Incident
description: This playbook responds to an incident where an attacker exploited a vulnerable web application to execute arbitrary commands on a server.

parallel--d504f266-a0ff-4997-8e17-099688.name: Execute Mitigations
parallel--d504f266-a0ff-4997-8e17-099688.description: Perform immediate mitigations in parallel to address the compromised system.

action--1ba82f2a-3a24-4a6b-8b56-5645e8e1.name: Kill malicious script process
action--1ba82f2a-3a24-4a6b-8b56-5645e8e1.description: Terminate any processes running the malicious script.

action--c6f607de-5b6e-46fe-971e-2c71b0b8.name: Remove dropped files
action--c6f607de-5b6e-46fe-971e-2c71b0b8.description: Delete the malicious shell script from the filesystem.

while-condition--784f0906-6c2b-47e3-b775.name: Scan Network for Additional Threats
while-condition--784f0906-6c2b-47e3-b775.description: Continuously scan the system for additional threats until no threats are found.

action--6b58ba91-b164-41d1-8b81-af2f744d.name: Scan for additional compromises
action--6b58ba91-b164-41d1-8b81-af2f744d.description: Run a security scan to identify other potential threats.

threat_found.description: Indicates if any threats were found during the scan.
